values: Our King Has Done Us No Wrong: A Tribute to Gregg HeinschOur King Has Done Us No Wrong: A Tribute to Gregg Heinsch

However long we serve Christ, we can look back and say, “My King has done me no wrong.” John Piper encourages a friend after four decades in ministry.However long we serve Christ, we can look back and say, “My King has done me no wrong.” John Piper encourages a friend after four decades in ministry.
